segment.source: Troubleshooting Application Virtualization Sequencer Issues
segment.target: Troubleshooting Application Virtualization Sequencer Issues

segment.source: Troubleshooting Application Virtualization Sequencer Issues
segment.target: Troubleshooting Application Virtualization Sequencer Issues

segment.source: Troubleshooting Application Virtualization Sequencer Issues
segment.target: Troubleshooting Application Virtualization Sequencer Issues

segment.source: This topic includes information that you can use to help troubleshoot general issues on the Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.
segment.target: This topic includes information that you can use to help troubleshoot general issues on the Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.

segment.source: Creating an SFTD File by Using the App-V Sequencer Increases the Version Number Unexpectedly
segment.target: Creating an SFTD File by Using the App-V Sequencer Increases the Version Number Unexpectedly

segment.source: Use the command line to generate a new .sft file.
segment.target: Use the command line to generate a new .sft file.

segment.source: To create the .sft file by using the command line, enter the following at a command prompt:
segment.target: To create the .sft file by using the command line, enter the following at a command prompt:

segment.source: mkdiffpkg.exe base SFT file namediff SFT file name
segment.target: mkdiffpkg.exe base SFT file namediff SFT file name

segment.source: File Name in OSD File Is Not Correct After Package Upgrade
segment.target: File Name in OSD File Is Not Correct After Package Upgrade

segment.source: When you open a package for upgrade, you should specify the root Q: drive as the output location for the package.
segment.target: When you open a package for upgrade, you should specify the root Q: drive as the output location for the package.

segment.source: Do not specify an associated file name with the output location.
segment.target: Do not specify an associated file name with the output location.

segment.source: Microsoft Word 2003 Default Install Results in an Error When Streamed to a Client
segment.target: Microsoft Word 2003 Default Install Results in an Error When Streamed to a Client

segment.source: When you stream Microsoft Word 2003 to a client, an error is returned, but Microsoft Word continues to run.
segment.target: When you stream Microsoft Word 2003 to a client, an error is returned, but Microsoft Word continues to run.

segment.source: Solution
segment.target: Solution

segment.source: Resequence the virtual application package and select Full Install.
segment.target: Resequence the virtual application package and select Full Install.

segment.source: Active Upgrade Does Not Work When You Create a Dependent Package
segment.target: Active Upgrade Does Not Work When You Create a Dependent Package

segment.source: When you create a dependent package by using active upgrade and add new registry entries, it appears to function correctly, but the updated registry entries are not available.
segment.target: When you create a dependent package by using active upgrade and add new registry entries, it appears to function correctly, but the updated registry entries are not available.

segment.source: Solution
segment.target: Solution

segment.source: Registry settings are always stored with the original version of the package, so updates to the package will not appear to be available unless you repair the original package.
segment.target: Registry settings are always stored with the original version of the package, so updates to the package will not appear to be available unless you repair the original package.

segment.source: Detailed information is not visible for Microsoft Office 2007 documents by using the properties page
segment.target: Detailed information is not visible for Microsoft Office 2007 documents by using the properties page

segment.source: When you try to view detailed information associated with a Microsoft Office 2007 document by using the properties page, the detailed information is not visible.
segment.target: When you try to view detailed information associated with a Microsoft Office 2007 document by using the properties page, the detailed information is not visible.

segment.source: Solution
segment.target: Solution

segment.source: App-V does not support the required shell extensions for these property pages.
segment.target: App-V does not support the required shell extensions for these property pages.

segment.source: Some registry keys are not captured when you sequence 16-bit applications
segment.target: Some registry keys are not captured when you sequence 16-bit applications

segment.source: In App-V 4.5, registry hooking has been moved from kernel mode to user mode.
segment.target: In App-V 4.5, registry hooking has been moved from kernel mode to user mode.

segment.source: If you want to sequence a 16-bit application or an application that uses a 16-bit installer, you must first configure the sequencer computer so that the process runs in its own copy of the Windows NT Virtual DOS Machine (NTVDM).
segment.target: If you want to sequence a 16-bit application or an application that uses a 16-bit installer, you must first configure the sequencer computer so that the process runs in its own copy of the Windows NT Virtual DOS Machine (NTVDM).

segment.source: Solution
segment.target: Solution

segment.source: Before you sequence the application, set the following global REGSZ registry key value to "yes" on the sequencing computer:
segment.target: Before you sequence the application, set the following global REGSZ registry key value to "yes" on the sequencing computer:

segment.source: HKLMSYSTEMCurrentControlSetControlWOWDefaultSeparateVDM
segment.target: HKLMSYSTEMCurrentControlSetControlWOWDefaultSeparateVDM

segment.source: You must restart the computer before this takes effect.
segment.target: You must restart the computer before this takes effect.
